dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: I can't wait any longer, when does the race start!?

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Do you even know what race this is?

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: This is the Beginner Race, you'll be racing agains other contestants this time.

dialogues.name: Manager
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Just follow the waypoints to complete a lap, complete three laps to finish the race.

dialogues.name: Racer
dialogues.dialougeTxt: Finally, some action! I can't wait!
